Class AssaultParty

java.lang.Object
shared_regions.AssaultParty
public class AssaultParty extends Object
Represents the AssaultParty shared region

      public void next()
      Function called by the ordinary thief when it reaches the desired destination; Blocks until all the other thieves are done crawling and are in AT_ROOM or in COLLECTION_SITE

    • reverseDirection

      public void reverseDirection()
      Last ordinary thief to roll a canvas signals the assault party that they are reversing direction. Reset some flags and notify

      public void crawlOut()
